A

Assignment3 - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Assignment3() - Constructor for class Assignment3
 

D

dance(Robot, Motor, Motor) - Static method in class Assignment3
This method is used to make the robot dance once it returns to a colour it has met before

F

findBlackLine(Robot, Motor, Motor) - Static method in class Assignment3
The robot will move forward until it reaches a black line

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Assignment3
This is the main program code for the robot, it manipulates other methods to perform the task of finding a matching colour the robot has recognized previously and then returns to that colour and dances
moveLeftOnColour(Robot, Motor, Motor) - Static method in class Assignment3
The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds a white area
moveLeftOnLine(Robot, Motor, Motor) - Static method in class Assignment3
The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds the black line again from being on an area of white
moveRightOnColour(Robot, Motor, Motor) - Static method in class Assignment3
The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds a non-white area
moveRightOnLine(Robot, Motor, Motor) - Static method in class Assignment3
The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds an area of white from being on the black line

S

sing(Robot, Speaker) - Static method in class Assignment3
This method is used to make the robot sing upon finding a matching colour that it has previously seen before

T

traverseBlackLine(Robot, Motor, Motor, ColorSensor) - Static method in class Assignment3
This method is used so that the robot traverses the black line, this is achived by following the edge of the black line, so the robot will re-adjust itself when it detects either black or white so that it can remain on the edge of a black line.
traverseColour(Robot, Motor, Motor, ColorSensor, int) - Static method in class Assignment3
The robot navigates around the circumference of a circle in an alternate directon each time it reaches a new colour
